languages.text: Ахиллеас Скаландр передал новые данные о планируемой атаке. Ксеносы уже готовятся нанести удар — необходимо срочное вмешательство Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Ахиллеас Скаландр передал новые данные о планируемой атаке. Ксеносы уже готовятся нанести удар — необходимо срочное вмешательство Вольного Торговца.

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.
languages.original_text: Ахиллеас Скаландр передал новые данные о планируемой атаке. Ксеносы уже готовятся нанести удар — необходимо срочное вмешательство Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.
Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.
Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.

languages.text: 阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德报告了关于异形袭击的最新消息。异形正在准备发起袭击，行商浪人必须立刻采取行动。
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.

traits.locale_text: 阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德报告了关于异形袭击的最新消息。异形正在准备发起袭击，行商浪人必须立刻采取行动。

languages.text: アキレアス・スカランダーは、計画されている襲撃についての新しい情報を報告した。異種族はすでに襲撃の準備を整えているため自由開拓者は直ちに行動しなければならない。
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.

traits.locale_text: アキレアス・スカランダーは、計画されている襲撃についての新しい情報を報告した。異種族はすでに襲撃の準備を整えているため自由開拓者は直ちに行動しなければならない。

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander ha proporcionado nueva información sobre el próximo ataque. Los xenos ya se están preparando para el asalto, por lo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe actuar de inmediato.
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander ha proporcionado nueva información sobre el próximo ataque. Los xenos ya se están preparando para el asalto, por lo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe actuar de inmediato.

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander hat neue Informationen über den geplanten Angriff gemeldet. Die Xenos bereiten schon den Angriff vor ... {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} muss sofort reagieren.
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander hat neue Informationen über den geplanten Angriff gemeldet. Die Xenos bereiten schon den Angriff vor ... {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} muss sofort reagieren.

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander a rassemblé de nouvelles informations sur l'assaut prévu. Les xénos se préparent déjà à frapper. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit agir immédiatement.
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander a rassemblé de nouvelles informations sur l'assaut prévu. Les xénos se préparent déjà à frapper. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit agir immédiatement.

languages.text: Achilleas Scalander, planlı saldırı hakkında yeni bilgiler rapor etti. Zenolar saldırıya hazırlanıyor. Hür Tacir, derhâl harekete geçmeli.
languages.original_text: Achilleas Scalander has reported new information about the planned attack. The xenos are already preparing to strike — the Rogue Trader must act immediately.

traits.locale_text: Achilleas Scalander, planlı saldırı hakkında yeni bilgiler rapor etti. Zenolar saldırmaya hazırlanıyor ve Hür Tacir derhâl harekete geçmeli.
